message.body: Hey when does Dan come home and how's your day going?
Next saturday, the 19th...and so far so good! Having a lazy morning so far but I'm going over to a friend's for a potluck tonight. Big plans for you and mom this weekend?

Just standard stuff . Behavior plan writing for Mom and wood cutting for me. Prob a DVD tonight and then I will tuck madre in and , I think, go sit in with the Chandler Brothers at Flavours in Pittsfield...
The C brothers are the drummer and bass player I use whenever I can for Dana Welts and the Modern World and a guitar player they've played with for years
Hope the day goes well call if you get lonesome
Haha thanks, will do! I've got a bunch of errands to fun so hopefully that won't be the case :-)
Ugh, I meant run...still getting used to the touchscreen keyboard...
